entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who needs to send a message to Arthur and will be in direct contact with him shortly.

entities.name: molly weasley
entities.description: Molly Weasley is mentioned as a person who knows what Fudge is and looks resolute.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the Minister of Magic who thinks Arthur lacks proper wizarding pride.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as a person whose fondness for Muggles has held him back at the Ministry.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is mentioned as someone who is shortsighted.

relationships.description: Dumbledore will be in direct contact with Arthur Weasley shortly.
Bill Weasley will tell his father, Arthur Weasley, what has happened.
